MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL78 postcode area of Bryn Teg, affecting properties in Bryn Teg and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:23PM. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers are on their way to the local area to investigate and repair the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 00:30AM. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:42PM on 16th April 2021.
